name: Verify PDF option for WFH Tab

testSteps.description: 1: Verify PDF option for WFH Tab ({parentTab=Leave Management, childTab=View Request Status, tab=Work From Home})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "View Request Status" sub tab of "Leave Management" tab
When Click on "Work From Home" tab
And Verify "WFH History List.pdf" file is downloaded

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "<childTab>" sub tab of "<parentTab>" tab
When Click on "<tab>" tab
And Verify "<tab>" displays
When Click on "Export" button
Then Verify "Copy,Excel,PDF,Print" options are displayed
When Click on "PDF" export option
And Verify "WFH History List.pdf" file is downloaded
